statements: DELETE FROM students WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 101 AND first_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM students WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND address LIKE '%California%'
DELETE FROM students WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%'
DELETE FROM courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM Registrations WHERE course_id = 101);
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE course_name = 'Math' AND instructor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 102 AND course_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Addresses WHERE student_id = 103 AND postal_code = '12345';
